document.full_text: a catholic monsignor, two priests and others named in the sexual abuse scandal rocking the archdiocese of philadelphia appeared in court on monday, where their defense tried unsuccessfully to have the presiding judge removed from the case.
document.title: accused in philadelphia church scandal appear in court
lines_and_colors: a catholic monsignor, two priests and others named in the sexual abuse scandal rocking the archdiocese of philadelphia appeared in court on monday, where their defense tried unsuccessfully to have the presiding judge removed from the case.
